entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: 博客测试 Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

entry.title: java入门
entry.content: java入门笔记 第一个Java程序Java代码Java程序是大小写敏感的 对格式没有严格要求，但用空格或Tab键缩进会比较好看 Hello.java12345public class Hello { public static void main(String[] args) { System.out.println("Hello, world!");}} 文件名必须是Hello.java，文件名也要注意大小写，必须与程序的类名完全一致，扩展名是.java。 编译切换到Hello.java所在目录：1javac Hello.java 无任何输出表示成功，可查看编译出的Hello.class文件。 执行1java Hello 代码格式：public 和 static 是修饰符static表示静态方法123456789101112131415161718192021/**可以自动创建文档的注释*/public class 类名 { public static void 方法名(参数) { //单行注释 你的程序代码; /* 多行注释 */}}//class定义结束``` ## Quick Start### Create a new post``` bash$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
